data.text:
RAVI TEJA

Ravi Teja is a popular Telugu actor.

Basics on Ravi Teja

Ravi Teja's real name is Bhupatiraju Ravishankar Raju. He was born on 20th January 1968 in Jaggampeta, East Godavari District, Andhra Pradesh. His father is Rajgopal Raju, a Pharmacist and Rajyalakshmi, a home maker.

He was a naughty child who used to set fire to couches to enact action scenes. He tried to run away from home to become an actor in Bollywood when he eleven years old.

He studied at N.S.M Public School and Siddhartha Degree College.

He is married to Kalyani. They got married in 2002 and had a daughterMokshadha in 2003 and a son Manit in 2006.

Ravi Teja's Movies

Ravi Teja worked in movies like Aaj Ki Goondaraj, Premaku Velayara and Criminal. He got a chance to work as an assistant director for Ninne Pelladatha. In 1999, he got a chance to work as the main hero in Nee Kosam.

He acted in secondary roles in movies like Annayya and Ammayi Kosam. He became a top hero with hits like Appu, Idiot and Chanthi. Vikramarkudu and Krishna were his biggest hits. Despite a few flops lime Baladoor and Neninthe he is still a successful actor.

In his next movie Anjaneyulu (2009) he will act with Nayantara..

Jr. NTR Biography Nandamuri Taraka Rama Rao (NTR) was born on 20th of MAy 1983 to N. Harikrishna and Shalini in Hyderabad. A.P. He is the grandson of the Late Nandamuri Taraka Rama Rao, who was a legendary actor and former chief minister of Andhra Pradesh. He is more popularly known as Jr. NTR or NTR Junior. He is fondly called as Tarak by his family influenced by his Grandfather NTR from his childhood and developed interest in cultural and social activities. He learned Kuchipudi dance during his School days and performed shows at various places both in India and abroad winning laurels and awards.

He did his schooling at Vidyaranya (Hyderabad) and later to St Rakesh's Junior College. He has a sister and two brothers, Kalyan Ram and Janaki Ram. His uncle Balakrishna Nandamuri is also a famous Telugu actor. His first step into Tollywood was the movie " Bala Ramayanam", directed by Gunasekhar. He started as Lord Rama as a child artist in Bala Ramayanam, a role patented by Sr. NTR. Began his career as a child actor and dancer. He made his debut with film, Ninnu Choodalani, in 2001. It was Aadi that catapulated him in to the big league. Aadi had stood as blockbuster of the year 2002. His next big blockbuster simhadri stabilized his status as the next mass hero of tollywood.

NTR consoders himself blessed to be born in Nandamuri family, to his fans he reminds Legend NTR looks, features and gestures. NTR is well known for the way he respects his elders in the industry, the way he speaks and associates himself with people and the spontaneity he displays in his actions, reactions and speeches.

Tarak owns a porsche 911 Carrera turbo, making him the only person in Andhra Pradesh to own a 911 Turbo, and the second actor in Tollywood to own a porsche, after Vishnu Babu, who owns a porsche Cayenne.

Favourities :

Actor : Nandamuri Taraka Rama Rao garu and Nandamuri Bala Krishna

Actress : Sridevi and Catherine Zeta Jones
